attributes.additional_details: Police to patrol and being on scene fast enough to catch them after the initial report phonecall. We have no police in little lever and are all beginning to be unsafe
attributes.background: Little Lever is at an ultimate high for crime at the moment, we have Zero police on patrol thieves and bullies are being allowed to do as they please leaving people in fear and damaging our property. More than 1 incident every single evening is being reported.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about crime, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to give your name in order to start a new petition. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244553
